summary: Frontend branding, rating display hardening, camera fallback messaging, and teen (13+) home-workout copy/plans were updated. Backend scoring logic was modified, but the current rating may still evaluate to 0 given the shown implementation. The requested app icon image update is not evidenced in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix the selfie scoring so the returned "current rating" is computed correctly (not always 0) while keeping the existing deterministic/explainable scoring approach and the existing API shape (CrossRealityScore with rating, potentialRating, details).
missing_requirements.reason: In the shown backend code, `submitSelfie` always uses `simulatedResults` with 3 items, and `CrossRealityScore.create` computes `score = 3 - results.size()`, which yields 0, making `rating = (score * 10)` equal to 0. This appears to keep returning 0 rather than a meaningful current rating.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the existing app icon image file to a looksmaxxing aesthetic (app-icon.dim_512x512.png > app-icon.dim_512x512.png).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows UI now references the icon and updates alt text/name, but it does not show any modification to the referenced image asset under `frontend/public/assets/generated/app-icon.dim_512x512.png` (no asset file change is listed).

hallucinated_features.description: Added a footer with a "Built with ❤️ using caffeine.ai" attribution and external link.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any requirement; also introduces new user-facing copy and an emoji.
